ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.MainActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LView<StoryList>

    public class MainActivity
extends Activity
implements LView<StoryList>
    Activity displayed for the start of the application. Allows the user to browse through available stories, and edit or read those stories depending on what mode they are in.
